channel.description: Recent content in 2022-03-31 00:00:00 +0000 UTC on Srikanth Perinkulam

item.title: 31 Mar 2022 00:00
item.description: ‘Urbanization’ peeking in quite adjacent to the Hauz Khas fort. This beautiful reservoir and the surrounding wooded area sealed the deal! Spent quite some time exploring around here this evening. Can’t wait to introduce M&S to this place.
item.content:encoded: ‘Urbanization’ peeking in quite adjacent to the Hauz Khas fort. This beautiful reservoir and the surrounding wooded area sealed the deal! Spent quite some time exploring around here this evening. Can’t wait to introduce M&S to this place.
